editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: F-193v: Praises of God, Wəddase Amlak, ውዳሴ፡ አምላክ፡. Devotional groups of prayers by Church Fathers, arranged for the days of the week. AbbCat 198, , Notice 99; EMML 1432. Compilations of Prayers and Supplications for the Seven Days, ጸሎት ወስእለት እንተ ዘ፯ ዕለታት. F-23v: Compilation of Prayers for Monday by Basil. F-60r: Compilation of Prayers for Tuesday by Ephrem. F-85v: Compilation of Prayers for Wednesday by Mari Ephrem. F-119r: Compilation of Prayers for Thursday by Aragawi Manfas Qeddus. F-146r: Compilation of Prayers for Friday by Synoda. F-167r: Compilation of Prayers for Saturday by Athanatius of Egypt. F-192v: Compilation of Prayers for Sunday by Cyril. Varia. F. i v: Repetitive prayer. Notes. The book bears the seal of ownership (in blue ink) of አባ ዮሐንስ ጳጳስ ዘአክሱም ወዘቍሎን እድያማተ ትግራይ, Abba Yohannes Bishop of Axum and all surrounding Tigre. contains a colophon which gives the date from the creation of the world, the EC date, and in the 12th year of the reign of ፋሲለደስ, Fasiledas (1632-1667), whose regnal name is Seltan Segad. "ዘተሰምየ ስመ መንግስቱ ስልጣን ስገድ".

revisionDesc.change: Created XML record from EMIP Collection Metadata.xsls
